DELTA, PA 17314

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:25 am to 10 am on
July 20, 2022. Inspectors knocked on doors, spoke with owner's wife, called employer's phone number, and spoke with
licensee. Licensee stated he was not available for inspection today and refused to allow wife to accompany inspectors to
conduct an inspection of the facility.
Additional Inspectors:
Jeffrey Shepherd, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALISTEnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:25 am to 10 am on 
July 20, 2022. Inspectors knocked on doors, spoke with owner's wife, called employer's phone number, and spoke with 
licensee. Licensee stated he was not available for inspection today and refused to allow wife to accompany inspectors to 
conduct an inspection of the facility. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors:
